channel.title: ReInnovationX - Old InnovationX Remake!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][URL=http://"http://www.reinnovationx.org"][SIZE=5]ReInnovationX[/SIZE][/URL][/B][/CENTER]
This is a remake of the old InnovationX. The server has all of the features from IX - Forum Integration, full Fight Caves, and much more.
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.reinnovationx.org"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.reinnovationx.org/play.php"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.reinnovationx.org/client.jar"]Client[/URL] -Must have forums account![/CENTER]
We have the official InnovationX source release. Full forum Integration - Must have a Forum Account to Play. Same exact look and feel as old InnovationX
You may have seen some other attempts at an Original Innovationx remake, but they have all failed due to various problems such as no forum integration, broken maps (No Jad), and even missing models (Crystal bows made players invisible) but all of that has been fixed as well as much more. The forums are currently being worked on, but are still fully accessible, and the server is 100% ready :) so come join us now at ReInnovationX.org!
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.reinnovationx.org"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.reinnovationx.org/play.php"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.reinnovationx.org/client.jar"]Client[/URL] -Must have forums account![/CENTER]
Home [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DxM3GcR.png[/img]
Jad [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Lmmf21U.png[/img]
KBD [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tRe8TyT.png[/img]
More Pictures coming soon!
